creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: abstract photographic image with vertical rainbow lines at center and pink and blue cloudlike forms with white spots of light of various sizes--may be distorted image of outer space with gas cloud and stars?; small color photo print resembling Polaroid image attached to outside of glazing on left side above center--image of four Black girls on a bench (pew?) with girl at right turning toward a figure in blue seated on bench behind them; black and gilt frame
title: Messier 81, Return of the Dove
